pullrequest.title: Unicode strings and other Python 3 forward-compatible changes.

content.raw:
I tested a bit and group_by (on pandas dataframe) was causing errors in my scripts that might as well just have been a old script so i'll do some more testing at home everything else worked fine.

Update: ok so I suspected that the error might have been caused by the dataframe update that I also had in the same lyse but it's not. So the dataframe seems to be effected by this change in someway. Also the tracebacks look strange:

![test.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BMBAeq/images/2177457640-test.png)

Update 2: It seems to be the mix of update dataframe and the unicode that gives me the error so I'll do investigating on the update dataframe side of things (where this probably goes wrong)
